sections.heading: of act.The Trade Secrets Act shall not apply to any misappropriation occurring prior to July 9, 1988
sections.text: With respect to a continuing misappropriation that began prior to July 9, 1988, such act also shall not apply to the continuing misappropriation that occurs after such date.SourceLaws 1988, LB 337A,

87-507.Applicability of act.

The Trade Secrets Act shall not apply to any misappropriation occurring prior to July 9, 1988. With respect to a continuing misappropriation that began prior to July 9, 1988, such act also shall not apply to the continuing misappropriation that occurs after such date.

SourceLaws 1988, LB 337A, ยง 7.
